product_name: Moving Comfort Urban Gym Capri Pants - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The plus-size Moving Comfort Urban Gym Capris for women are ready to keep up with tough workouts thanks to performance fabric with a wide, smooth waistband for a flattering fit. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps you stay comfortable and features a UPF 50+ rating. Hidden pocket in waistband is big enough for a key or debit card. Chafe-free, flatlock seams. Wide Powermesh waistband slims and stays put. Adjustable drawcord at side hem offers easy adjustment. The plus-size Moving Comfort Urban Gym Capris for women offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: The plus-size Moving Comfort Urban Gym Capris for women are ready to keep up with tough workouts thanks to performance fabric with a wide, smooth waistband for a flattering fit.
